synopsis.text: Nanatsu no Bitoku, a continuation of Sin: Nanatsu no Taizai, unfolds as Heaven descends into turmoil, and the Seven Mortal Sins, demonic entities from Hell, begin to wreak havoc on Earth. In response, the divine Seven Heavenly Virtues, a group of stunning angels, are dispatched to Earth on a mission of utmost urgency: to find a worthy candidate to become the 'true messiah.' As these celestial beauties race against time, they become increasingly aware of the widespread influence of the Seven Mortal Sins. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, will the chosen one be able to rise to the challenge and resist the allure of these captivating angels? Join the Seven Heavenly Virtues in their quest to restore order and thwart the sinister plans of Lucifer and his emissaries.
